ComicInfo.Summary:
Clem Atwill tries to use his money to become powerful but soon realizes that he's wasted his money on a mirage.
After a robbery goes wrong and Bremer kills Mr. Hubbard, he tries to pin the murder on Adams only to discover that Adams is a robot.
